title: Cutout animation
creator_credit: AFTRS, Eric Halliday and Davis Johnson
brief_description: A very good hands-on type film which will show students a way of getting into animation by some means other than drawing. A similar type of animation as seen in the opening credits of the Monty Python Show is shown.
description: A very good hands-on type film which will show students a way of getting into animation by some means other than drawing. A similar type of animation as seen in the opening credits of the Monty Python Show is shown.
